module Amazonka.Macie.Types.ClassificationTypeUpdate

-- | The classification type that Amazon Macie Classic applies to the
--   associated S3 resources. At least one of the classification types
--   (oneTime or continuous) must be specified.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newClassificationTypeUpdate</a> smart constructor.
data ClassificationTypeUpdate
ClassificationTypeUpdate' :: Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType -> Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType -> ClassificationTypeUpdate

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
[$sel:continuous:ClassificationTypeUpdate'] :: ClassificationTypeUpdate -> Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
[$sel:oneTime:ClassificationTypeUpdate'] :: ClassificationTypeUpdate -> Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType

-- | Create a value of <a>ClassificationTypeUpdate</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:continuous:ClassificationTypeUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>classificationTypeUpdate_continuous</a> - A continuous
--   classification of the objects that are added to a specified S3 bucket.
--   Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous classification after
--   a bucket is successfully associated with Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:oneTime:ClassificationTypeUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>classificationTypeUpdate_oneTime</a> - A one-time classification of
--   all of the existing objects in a specified S3 bucket.
newClassificationTypeUpdate :: ClassificationTypeUpdate

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
classificationTypeUpdate_continuous :: Lens' ClassificationTypeUpdate (Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType)

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
classificationTypeUpdate_oneTime :: Lens' ClassificationTypeUpdate (Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType)

module Amazonka.Macie.Types.S3ResourceClassification

-- | The S3 resources that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic
--   for monitoring and data classification. This data type is used as a
--   request parameter in the AssociateS3Resources action and a response
--   parameter in the ListS3Resources action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newS3ResourceClassification</a> smart constructor.

module Amazonka.Macie.Types

-- | API version <tt>2017-12-19</tt> of the Amazon Macie SDK configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | You do not have required permissions to access the requested resource.
_AccessDeniedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request was rejected because an invalid or out-of-range value was
--   supplied for an input parameter.
_InvalidInputException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Internal server error.
_InternalException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request was rejected because it attempted to create resources
--   beyond the current AWS account limits. The error code describes the
--   limit exceeded.
_LimitExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError
newtype S3ContinuousClassificationType
S3ContinuousClassificationType' :: Text -> S3ContinuousClassificationType
[fromS3ContinuousClassificationType] :: S3ContinuousClassificationType -> Text
pattern S3ContinuousClassificationType_FULL :: S3ContinuousClassificationType
newtype S3OneTimeClassificationType
S3OneTimeClassificationType' :: Text -> S3OneTimeClassificationType
[fromS3OneTimeClassificationType] :: S3OneTimeClassificationType -> Text
pattern S3OneTimeClassificationType_FULL :: S3OneTimeClassificationType
pattern S3OneTimeClassificationType_NONE :: S3OneTimeClassificationType

-- | The classification type that Amazon Macie Classic applies to the
--   associated S3 resources.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newClassificationType</a> smart constructor.
data ClassificationType
ClassificationType' :: S3OneTimeClassificationType -> S3ContinuousClassificationType -> ClassificationType

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
[$sel:oneTime:ClassificationType'] :: ClassificationType -> S3OneTimeClassificationType

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
[$sel:continuous:ClassificationType'] :: ClassificationType -> S3ContinuousClassificationType

-- | Create a value of <a>ClassificationType</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:oneTime:ClassificationType'</a>,
--   <a>classificationType_oneTime</a> - A one-time classification of all
--   of the existing objects in a specified S3 bucket.
--   
--   <a>$sel:continuous:ClassificationType'</a>,
--   <a>classificationType_continuous</a> - A continuous classification of
--   the objects that are added to a specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie
--   Classic begins performing continuous classification after a bucket is
--   successfully associated with Macie Classic.
newClassificationType :: S3OneTimeClassificationType -> S3ContinuousClassificationType -> ClassificationType

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
classificationType_oneTime :: Lens' ClassificationType S3OneTimeClassificationType

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
classificationType_continuous :: Lens' ClassificationType S3ContinuousClassificationType

-- | The classification type that Amazon Macie Classic applies to the
--   associated S3 resources. At least one of the classification types
--   (oneTime or continuous) must be specified.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newClassificationTypeUpdate</a> smart constructor.
data ClassificationTypeUpdate
ClassificationTypeUpdate' :: Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType -> Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType -> ClassificationTypeUpdate

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
[$sel:continuous:ClassificationTypeUpdate'] :: ClassificationTypeUpdate -> Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
[$sel:oneTime:ClassificationTypeUpdate'] :: ClassificationTypeUpdate -> Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType

-- | Create a value of <a>ClassificationTypeUpdate</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:continuous:ClassificationTypeUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>classificationTypeUpdate_continuous</a> - A continuous
--   classification of the objects that are added to a specified S3 bucket.
--   Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous classification after
--   a bucket is successfully associated with Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:oneTime:ClassificationTypeUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>classificationTypeUpdate_oneTime</a> - A one-time classification of
--   all of the existing objects in a specified S3 bucket.
newClassificationTypeUpdate :: ClassificationTypeUpdate

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
classificationTypeUpdate_continuous :: Lens' ClassificationTypeUpdate (Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType)

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
classificationTypeUpdate_oneTime :: Lens' ClassificationTypeUpdate (Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType)

-- | Includes details about the failed S3 resources.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFailedS3Resource</a> smart constructor.
data FailedS3Resource
FailedS3Resource' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe S3Resource -> FailedS3Resource

-- | The status code of a failed item.
[$sel:errorCode:FailedS3Resource'] :: FailedS3Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The error message of a failed item.
[$sel:errorMessage:FailedS3Resource'] :: FailedS3Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The failed S3 resources.
[$sel:failedItem:FailedS3Resource'] :: FailedS3Resource -> Maybe S3Resource

-- | Create a value of <a>FailedS3Resource</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:errorCode:FailedS3Resource'</a>,
--   <a>failedS3Resource_errorCode</a> - The status code of a failed item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:errorMessage:FailedS3Resource'</a>,
--   <a>failedS3Resource_errorMessage</a> - The error message of a failed
--   item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:failedItem:FailedS3Resource'</a>,
--   <a>failedS3Resource_failedItem</a> - The failed S3 resources.
newFailedS3Resource :: FailedS3Resource

-- | The status code of a failed item.
failedS3Resource_errorCode :: Lens' FailedS3Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The error message of a failed item.
failedS3Resource_errorMessage :: Lens' FailedS3Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The failed S3 resources.
failedS3Resource_failedItem :: Lens' FailedS3Resource (Maybe S3Resource)

-- | Contains information about the S3 resource. This data type is used as
--   a request parameter in the DisassociateS3Resources action and can be
--   used as a response parameter in the AssociateS3Resources and
--   UpdateS3Resources actions.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newS3Resource</a> smart constructor.
data S3Resource
S3Resource' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> S3Resource

-- | The prefix of the S3 bucket.
[$sel:prefix:S3Resource'] :: S3Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the S3 bucket.
[$sel:bucketName:S3Resource'] :: S3Resource -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>S3Resource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:prefix:S3Resource'</a>, <a>s3Resource_prefix</a> - The prefix
--   of the S3 bucket.
--   
--   <a>$sel:bucketName:S3Resource'</a>, <a>s3Resource_bucketName</a> - The
--   name of the S3 bucket.
newS3Resource :: Text -> S3Resource

-- | The prefix of the S3 bucket.
s3Resource_prefix :: Lens' S3Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the S3 bucket.
s3Resource_bucketName :: Lens' S3Resource Text

-- | The S3 resources that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic
--   for monitoring and data classification. This data type is used as a
--   request parameter in the AssociateS3Resources action and a response
--   parameter in the ListS3Resources action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newS3ResourceClassification</a> smart constructor.
data S3ResourceClassification
S3ResourceClassification' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> ClassificationType -> S3ResourceClassification

-- | The prefix of the S3 bucket that you want to associate with Amazon
--   Macie Classic.
[$sel:prefix:S3ResourceClassification'] :: S3ResourceClassification -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the S3 bucket that you want to associate with Amazon Macie
--   Classic.
[$sel:bucketName:S3ResourceClassification'] :: S3ResourceClassification -> Text

-- | The classification type that you want to specify for the resource
--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
[$sel:classificationType:S3ResourceClassification'] :: S3ResourceClassification -> ClassificationType

-- | Create a value of <a>S3ResourceClassification</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:bucketName:S3ResourceClassification'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassification_bucketName</a> - The name of the S3 bucket
--   that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:classificationType:S3ResourceClassification'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassification_classificationType</a> - The
--   classification type that you want to specify for the resource
--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
newS3ResourceClassification :: Text -> ClassificationType -> S3ResourceClassification

-- | The prefix of the S3 bucket that you want to associate with Amazon
--   Macie Classic.
s3ResourceClassification_prefix :: Lens' S3ResourceClassification (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the S3 bucket that you want to associate with Amazon Macie
--   Classic.
s3ResourceClassification_bucketName :: Lens' S3ResourceClassification Text

-- | The classification type that you want to specify for the resource
--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
s3ResourceClassification_classificationType :: Lens' S3ResourceClassification ClassificationType

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types you want to update. This
--   data type is used as a request parameter in the UpdateS3Resources
--   action.
--

--   constructor.

--   update.

--   update.

--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.

--   optional fields omitted.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   bucket whose classification types you want to update.

--   bucket whose classification types you want to update.

--   update.

-- | The name of the S3 bucket whose classification types you want to
--   update.

--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
s3ResourceClassificationUpdate_classificationTypeUpdate :: Lens' S3ResourceClassificationUpdate ClassificationTypeUpdate


-- | Lists all the S3 resources associated with Amazon Macie Classic. If
--   memberAccountId isn't specified, the action lists the S3 resources
--   associated with Macie Classic for the current Macie Classic
--   administrator account. If memberAccountId is specified, the action
--   lists the S3 resources associated with Macie Classic for the specified
--   member account.
--   
--   This operation returns paginated results.
module Amazonka.Macie.ListS3Resources

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListS3Resources</a> smart constructor.
data ListS3Resources
ListS3Resources' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> ListS3Resources

-- | The Amazon Macie Classic member account ID whose associated S3
--   resources you want to list.
[$sel:memberAccountId:ListS3Resources'] :: ListS3Resources -> Maybe Text

-- | Use this parameter when paginating results. Set its value to null on
--   your first call to the ListS3Resources action. Subsequent calls to the
--   action fill nextToken in the request with the value of nextToken from
--   the previous response to continue listing data.
[$sel:nextToken:ListS3Resources'] :: ListS3Resources -> Maybe Text

-- | Use this parameter to indicate the maximum number of items that you
--   want in the response. The default value is 250.
[$sel:maxResults:ListS3Resources'] :: ListS3Resources -> Maybe Int

-- | Create a value of <a>ListS3Resources</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   member account ID whose associated S3 resources you want to list.

--   results. Set its value to null on your first call to the
--   ListS3Resources action. Subsequent calls to the action fill nextToken
--   in the request with the value of nextToken from the previous response
--   to continue listing data.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxResults:ListS3Resources'</a>,
--   <a>listS3Resources_maxResults</a> - Use this parameter to indicate the
--   maximum number of items that you want in the response. The default
--   value is 250.
newListS3Resources :: ListS3Resources

-- | The Amazon Macie Classic member account ID whose associated S3
--   resources you want to list.
listS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' ListS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | Use this parameter when paginating results. Set its value to null on
--   your first call to the ListS3Resources action. Subsequent calls to the
--   action fill nextToken in the request with the value of nextToken from
--   the previous response to continue listing data.
listS3Resources_nextToken :: Lens' ListS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | Use this parameter to indicate the maximum number of items that you
--   want in the response. The default value is 250.
listS3Resources_maxResults :: Lens' ListS3Resources (Maybe Int)

data ListS3ResourcesResponse
ListS3ResourcesResponse' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [S3ResourceClassification] -> Int -> ListS3ResourcesResponse

--   parameter is present in the response and contains the value to use for

--   present in the response and contains the value to use for the

-- | Removes specified S3 resources from being monitored by Amazon Macie
--   Classic. If memberAccountId isn't specified, the action removes
--   specified S3 resources from Macie Classic for the current Macie
--   Classic administrator account. If memberAccountId is specified, the
--   action removes specified S3 resources from Macie Classic for the
--   specified member account.
module Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDisassociateS3Resources</a> smart constructor.
data DisassociateS3Resources
DisassociateS3Resources' :: Maybe Text -> [S3Resource] -> DisassociateS3Resources

-- | The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you
--   want to remove from being monitored by Macie Classic.
[$sel:memberAccountId:DisassociateS3Resources'] :: DisassociateS3Resources -> Maybe Text

-- | The S3 resources (buckets or prefixes) that you want to remove from
--   being monitored and classified by Amazon Macie Classic.
[$sel:associatedS3Resources:DisassociateS3Resources'] :: DisassociateS3Resources -> [S3Resource]

-- | Create a value of <a>DisassociateS3Resources</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:memberAccountId:DisassociateS3Resources'</a>,
--   <a>disassociateS3Resources_memberAccountId</a> - The ID of the Amazon
--   Macie Classic member account whose resources you want to remove from
--   being monitored by Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:associatedS3Resources:DisassociateS3Resources'</a>,
--   <a>disassociateS3Resources_associatedS3Resources</a> - The S3
--   resources (buckets or prefixes) that you want to remove from being
--   monitored and classified by Amazon Macie Classic.
newDisassociateS3Resources :: DisassociateS3Resources

-- | The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you
--   want to remove from being monitored by Macie Classic.
disassociateS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' DisassociateS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | The S3 resources (buckets or prefixes) that you want to remove from
--   being monitored and classified by Amazon Macie Classic.
disassociateS3Resources_associatedS3Resources :: Lens' DisassociateS3Resources [S3Resource]

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDisassociateS3ResourcesResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse
DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse' :: Maybe [FailedS3Resource] -> Int -> DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse

-- | S3 resources that couldn't be removed from being monitored and
--   classified by Amazon Macie Classic. An error code and an error message
--   are provided for each failed item.
[$sel:failedS3Resources:DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse'] :: DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse -> Maybe [FailedS3Resource]

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse'] :: DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:failedS3Resources:DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>disassociateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources</a> - S3
--   resources that couldn't be removed from being monitored and classified
--   by Amazon Macie Classic. An error code and an error message are
--   provided for each failed item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>disassociateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's
--   http status code.
newDisassociateS3ResourcesResponse :: Int -> DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse

-- | S3 resources that couldn't be removed from being monitored and
--   classified by Amazon Macie Classic. An error code and an error message
--   are provided for each failed item.
disassociateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources :: Lens' DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe [FailedS3Resource])

-- | The response's http status code.
disassociateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse Int
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse
instance Amazonka.Types.AWSRequest Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance Amazonka.Data.Headers.ToHeaders Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance Amazonka.Data.Path.ToPath Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources
instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.Macie.DisassociateS3Resources.DisassociateS3Resources

-- | Associates specified S3 resources with Amazon Macie Classic for
--   monitoring and data classification. If memberAccountId isn't
--   specified, the action associates specified S3 resources with Macie
--   Classic for the current Macie Classic administrator account. If
--   memberAccountId is specified, the action associates specified S3
--   resources with Macie Classic for the specified member account.
module Amazonka.Macie.AssociateS3Resources

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newAssociateS3Resources</a> smart constructor.
data AssociateS3Resources
AssociateS3Resources' :: Maybe Text -> [S3ResourceClassification] -> AssociateS3Resources

-- | The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you
--   want to associate with Macie Classic.
[$sel:memberAccountId:AssociateS3Resources'] :: AssociateS3Resources -> Maybe Text

-- | The S3 resources that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic
--   for monitoring and data classification.
[$sel:s3Resources:AssociateS3Resources'] :: AssociateS3Resources -> [S3ResourceClassification]

-- | Create a value of <a>AssociateS3Resources</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:memberAccountId:AssociateS3Resources'</a>,
--   <a>associateS3Resources_memberAccountId</a> - The ID of the Amazon
--   Macie Classic member account whose resources you want to associate
--   with Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Resources:AssociateS3Resources'</a>,
--   <a>associateS3Resources_s3Resources</a> - The S3 resources that you
--   want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic for monitoring and data
--   classification.
newAssociateS3Resources :: AssociateS3Resources

-- | The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you
--   want to associate with Macie Classic.
associateS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' AssociateS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | The S3 resources that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic
--   for monitoring and data classification.
associateS3Resources_s3Resources :: Lens' AssociateS3Resources [S3ResourceClassification]

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newAssociateS3ResourcesResponse</a> smart constructor.
data AssociateS3ResourcesResponse
AssociateS3ResourcesResponse' :: Maybe [FailedS3Resource] -> Int -> AssociateS3ResourcesResponse

-- | S3 resources that couldn't be associated with Amazon Macie Classic. An
--   error code and an error message are provided for each failed item.
[$sel:failedS3Resources:AssociateS3ResourcesResponse'] :: AssociateS3ResourcesResponse -> Maybe [FailedS3Resource]

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:AssociateS3ResourcesResponse'] :: AssociateS3ResourcesResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>AssociateS3ResourcesResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:failedS3Resources:AssociateS3ResourcesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>associateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources</a> - S3 resources
--   that couldn't be associated with Amazon Macie Classic. An error code
--   and an error message are provided for each failed item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:AssociateS3ResourcesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>associateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http
--   status code.
newAssociateS3ResourcesResponse :: Int -> AssociateS3ResourcesResponse

-- | S3 resources that couldn't be associated with Amazon Macie Classic. An
--   error code and an error message are provided for each failed item.
associateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources :: Lens' AssociateS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe [FailedS3Resource])

-- | The response's http status code.
associateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' AssociateS3ResourcesResponse Int
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.Macie.AssociateS3Resources.AssociateS3Resources
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.Macie.AssociateS3Resources.AssociateS3Resources

instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.Macie.AssociateS3Resources.AssociateS3Resources

-- | Updates the classification types for the specified S3 resources. If
--   memberAccountId isn't specified, the action updates the classification
--   types of the S3 resources associated with Amazon Macie Classic for the
--   current Macie Classic administrator account. If memberAccountId is
--   specified, the action updates the classification types of the S3
--   resources associated with Macie Classic for the specified member
--   account.
module Amazonka.Macie.UpdateS3Resources

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateS3Resources</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateS3Resources
UpdateS3Resources' :: Maybe Text -> [S3ResourceClassificationUpdate] -> UpdateS3Resources

-- | The AWS ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose S3
--   resources' classification types you want to update.
[$sel:memberAccountId:UpdateS3Resources'] :: UpdateS3Resources -> Maybe Text

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types you want to update.
[$sel:s3ResourcesUpdate:UpdateS3Resources'] :: UpdateS3Resources -> [S3ResourceClassificationUpdate]

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateS3Resources</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:memberAccountId:UpdateS3Resources'</a>,
--   <a>updateS3Resources_memberAccountId</a> - The AWS ID of the Amazon
--   Macie Classic member account whose S3 resources' classification types
--   you want to update.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3ResourcesUpdate:UpdateS3Resources'</a>,
--   <a>updateS3Resources_s3ResourcesUpdate</a> - The S3 resources whose
--   classification types you want to update.
newUpdateS3Resources :: UpdateS3Resources

-- | The AWS ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose S3
--   resources' classification types you want to update.
updateS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' UpdateS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types you want to update.
updateS3Resources_s3ResourcesUpdate :: Lens' UpdateS3Resources [S3ResourceClassificationUpdate]

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateS3ResourcesResponse</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateS3ResourcesResponse
UpdateS3ResourcesResponse' :: Maybe [FailedS3Resource] -> Int -> UpdateS3ResourcesResponse

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types can't be updated. An error
--   code and an error message are provided for each failed item.
[$sel:failedS3Resources:UpdateS3ResourcesResponse'] :: UpdateS3ResourcesResponse -> Maybe [FailedS3Resource]

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:UpdateS3ResourcesResponse'] :: UpdateS3ResourcesResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateS3ResourcesResponse</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:failedS3Resources:UpdateS3ResourcesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>updateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources</a> - The S3 resources
--   whose classification types can't be updated. An error code and an
--   error message are provided for each failed item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:UpdateS3ResourcesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>updateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http
--   status code.
newUpdateS3ResourcesResponse :: Int -> UpdateS3ResourcesResponse

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types can't be updated. An error
--   code and an error message are provided for each failed item.
updateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources :: Lens' UpdateS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe [FailedS3Resource])

-- | The response's http status code.
updateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' UpdateS3ResourcesResponse Int

module Amazonka.Macie.Lens

-- | The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you
--   want to associate with Macie Classic.
associateS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' AssociateS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | The S3 resources that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic
--   for monitoring and data classification.
associateS3Resources_s3Resources :: Lens' AssociateS3Resources [S3ResourceClassification]

-- | S3 resources that couldn't be associated with Amazon Macie Classic. An
--   error code and an error message are provided for each failed item.
associateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources :: Lens' AssociateS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe [FailedS3Resource])

-- | The response's http status code.
associateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' AssociateS3ResourcesResponse Int

-- | The ID of the AWS account that you want to associate with Amazon Macie
--   Classic as a member account.
associateMemberAccount_memberAccountId :: Lens' AssociateMemberAccount Text

-- | The AWS ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose S3
--   resources' classification types you want to update.
updateS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' UpdateS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types you want to update.
updateS3Resources_s3ResourcesUpdate :: Lens' UpdateS3Resources [S3ResourceClassificationUpdate]

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types can't be updated. An error
--   code and an error message are provided for each failed item.
updateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources :: Lens' UpdateS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe [FailedS3Resource])

-- | The response's http status code.
updateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' UpdateS3ResourcesResponse Int

-- | Use this parameter when paginating results. Set the value of this
--   parameter to null on your first call to the ListMemberAccounts action.
--   Subsequent calls to the action fill nextToken in the request with the
--   value of nextToken from the previous response to continue listing
--   data.
listMemberAccounts_nextToken :: Lens' ListMemberAccounts (Maybe Text)

-- | Use this parameter to indicate the maximum number of items that you
--   want in the response. The default value is 250.
listMemberAccounts_maxResults :: Lens' ListMemberAccounts (Maybe Int)

-- | When a response is generated, if there is more data to be listed, this
--   parameter is present in the response and contains the value to use for
--   the nextToken parameter in a subsequent pagination request. If there
--   is no more data to be listed, this parameter is set to null.
listMemberAccountsResponse_nextToken :: Lens' ListMemberAccountsResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of the Amazon Macie Classic member accounts returned by the
--   action. The current Macie Classic administrator account is also
--   included in this list.
listMemberAccountsResponse_memberAccounts :: Lens' ListMemberAccountsResponse (Maybe [MemberAccount])

-- | The response's http status code.
listMemberAccountsResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' ListMemberAccountsResponse Int

-- | The ID of the member account that you want to remove from Amazon Macie
--   Classic.
disassociateMemberAccount_memberAccountId :: Lens' DisassociateMemberAccount Text

-- | The Amazon Macie Classic member account ID whose associated S3
--   resources you want to list.
listS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' ListS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | Use this parameter when paginating results. Set its value to null on
--   your first call to the ListS3Resources action. Subsequent calls to the
--   action fill nextToken in the request with the value of nextToken from
--   the previous response to continue listing data.
listS3Resources_nextToken :: Lens' ListS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | Use this parameter to indicate the maximum number of items that you
--   want in the response. The default value is 250.
listS3Resources_maxResults :: Lens' ListS3Resources (Maybe Int)

-- | When a response is generated, if there is more data to be listed, this
--   parameter is present in the response and contains the value to use for
--   the nextToken parameter in a subsequent pagination request. If there
--   is no more data to be listed, this parameter is set to null.
listS3ResourcesResponse_nextToken :: Lens' ListS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of the associated S3 resources returned by the action.
listS3ResourcesResponse_s3Resources :: Lens' ListS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe [S3ResourceClassification])

-- | The response's http status code.
listS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' ListS3ResourcesResponse Int

-- | The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you
--   want to remove from being monitored by Macie Classic.
disassociateS3Resources_memberAccountId :: Lens' DisassociateS3Resources (Maybe Text)

-- | The S3 resources (buckets or prefixes) that you want to remove from
--   being monitored and classified by Amazon Macie Classic.
disassociateS3Resources_associatedS3Resources :: Lens' DisassociateS3Resources [S3Resource]

-- | S3 resources that couldn't be removed from being monitored and
--   classified by Amazon Macie Classic. An error code and an error message
--   are provided for each failed item.
disassociateS3ResourcesResponse_failedS3Resources :: Lens' DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse (Maybe [FailedS3Resource])

-- | The response's http status code.
disassociateS3ResourcesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse Int

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
classificationType_oneTime :: Lens' ClassificationType S3OneTimeClassificationType

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
classificationType_continuous :: Lens' ClassificationType S3ContinuousClassificationType

-- | A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a
--   specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous
--   classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie
--   Classic.
classificationTypeUpdate_continuous :: Lens' ClassificationTypeUpdate (Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType)

-- | A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a
--   specified S3 bucket.
classificationTypeUpdate_oneTime :: Lens' ClassificationTypeUpdate (Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType)

-- | The status code of a failed item.
failedS3Resource_errorCode :: Lens' FailedS3Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The error message of a failed item.
failedS3Resource_errorMessage :: Lens' FailedS3Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The failed S3 resources.
failedS3Resource_failedItem :: Lens' FailedS3Resource (Maybe S3Resource)

-- | The AWS account ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account.
memberAccount_accountId :: Lens' MemberAccount (Maybe Text)

-- | The prefix of the S3 bucket.
s3Resource_prefix :: Lens' S3Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the S3 bucket.
s3Resource_bucketName :: Lens' S3Resource Text

-- | The prefix of the S3 bucket that you want to associate with Amazon
--   Macie Classic.
s3ResourceClassification_prefix :: Lens' S3ResourceClassification (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the S3 bucket that you want to associate with Amazon Macie
--   Classic.
s3ResourceClassification_bucketName :: Lens' S3ResourceClassification Text

-- | The classification type that you want to specify for the resource
--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
s3ResourceClassification_classificationType :: Lens' S3ResourceClassification ClassificationType

-- | The prefix of the S3 bucket whose classification types you want to
--   update.
s3ResourceClassificationUpdate_prefix :: Lens' S3ResourceClassificationUpdate (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the S3 bucket whose classification types you want to
--   update.
s3ResourceClassificationUpdate_bucketName :: Lens' S3ResourceClassificationUpdate Text

-- | The classification type that you want to update for the resource
--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
s3ResourceClassificationUpdate_classificationTypeUpdate :: Lens' S3ResourceClassificationUpdate ClassificationTypeUpdate


module Amazonka.Macie.Waiters


-- | Derived from API version <tt>2017-12-19</tt> of the AWS service
--   descriptions, licensed under Apache 2.0.
--   
--   Amazon Macie Classic
--   
--   Amazon Macie Classic is a security service that uses machine learning
--   to automatically discover, classify, and protect sensitive data in
--   AWS. Macie Classic recognizes sensitive data such as personally
--   identifiable information (PII) or intellectual property, and provides
--   you with dashboards and alerts that give visibility into how this data
--   is being accessed or moved. For more information, see the <a>Amazon
--   Macie Classic User Guide</a>.
module Amazonka.Macie

-- | API version <tt>2017-12-19</tt> of the Amazon Macie SDK configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | You do not have required permissions to access the requested resource.
_AccessDeniedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request was rejected because an invalid or out-of-range value was
--   supplied for an input parameter.
_InvalidInputException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Internal server error.
_InternalException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request was rejected because it attempted to create resources
--   beyond the current AWS account limits. The error code describes the
--   limit exceeded.
_LimitExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newAssociateS3Resources</a> smart constructor.

--   with Macie Classic.

--   want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic for monitoring and data
--   classification.

newtype S3ContinuousClassificationType
S3ContinuousClassificationType' :: Text -> S3ContinuousClassificationType
[fromS3ContinuousClassificationType] :: S3ContinuousClassificationType -> Text
pattern S3ContinuousClassificationType_FULL :: S3ContinuousClassificationType
newtype S3OneTimeClassificationType
S3OneTimeClassificationType' :: Text -> S3OneTimeClassificationType
[fromS3OneTimeClassificationType] :: S3OneTimeClassificationType -> Text
pattern S3OneTimeClassificationType_FULL :: S3OneTimeClassificationType
pattern S3OneTimeClassificationType_NONE :: S3OneTimeClassificationType

-- | The classification type that Amazon Macie Classic applies to the
--   associated S3 resources.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newClassificationType</a> smart constructor.
data ClassificationType
ClassificationType' :: S3OneTimeClassificationType -> S3ContinuousClassificationType -> ClassificationType

-- | Create a value of <a>ClassificationType</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:oneTime:ClassificationType'</a>,
--   <a>classificationType_oneTime</a> - A one-time classification of all
--   of the existing objects in a specified S3 bucket.
--   
--   <a>$sel:continuous:ClassificationType'</a>,
--   <a>classificationType_continuous</a> - A continuous classification of
--   the objects that are added to a specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie
--   Classic begins performing continuous classification after a bucket is
--   successfully associated with Macie Classic.
newClassificationType :: S3OneTimeClassificationType -> S3ContinuousClassificationType -> ClassificationType

-- | The classification type that Amazon Macie Classic applies to the
--   associated S3 resources. At least one of the classification types
--   (oneTime or continuous) must be specified.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newClassificationTypeUpdate</a> smart constructor.
data ClassificationTypeUpdate
ClassificationTypeUpdate' :: Maybe S3ContinuousClassificationType -> Maybe S3OneTimeClassificationType -> ClassificationTypeUpdate

-- | Create a value of <a>ClassificationTypeUpdate</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:continuous:ClassificationTypeUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>classificationTypeUpdate_continuous</a> - A continuous
--   classification of the objects that are added to a specified S3 bucket.
--   Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous classification after
--   a bucket is successfully associated with Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:oneTime:ClassificationTypeUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>classificationTypeUpdate_oneTime</a> - A one-time classification of
--   all of the existing objects in a specified S3 bucket.
newClassificationTypeUpdate :: ClassificationTypeUpdate

--   <a>failedS3Resource_errorMessage</a> - The error message of a failed
--   item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:failedItem:FailedS3Resource'</a>,
--   <a>failedS3Resource_failedItem</a> - The failed S3 resources.
newFailedS3Resource :: FailedS3Resource

-- | Contains information about the S3 resource. This data type is used as
--   a request parameter in the DisassociateS3Resources action and can be
--   used as a response parameter in the AssociateS3Resources and
--   UpdateS3Resources actions.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newS3Resource</a> smart constructor.
data S3Resource
S3Resource' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> S3Resource

-- | Create a value of <a>S3Resource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:prefix:S3Resource'</a>, <a>s3Resource_prefix</a> - The prefix
--   of the S3 bucket.
--   
--   <a>$sel:bucketName:S3Resource'</a>, <a>s3Resource_bucketName</a> - The
--   name of the S3 bucket.
newS3Resource :: Text -> S3Resource

-- | The S3 resources that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic
--   for monitoring and data classification. This data type is used as a
--   request parameter in the AssociateS3Resources action and a response
--   parameter in the ListS3Resources action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newS3ResourceClassification</a> smart constructor.
data S3ResourceClassification
S3ResourceClassification' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> ClassificationType -> S3ResourceClassification

-- | Create a value of <a>S3ResourceClassification</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:prefix:S3ResourceClassification'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassification_prefix</a> - The prefix of the S3 bucket
--   that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:bucketName:S3ResourceClassification'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassification_bucketName</a> - The name of the S3 bucket
--   that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:classificationType:S3ResourceClassification'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassification_classificationType</a> - The
--   classification type that you want to specify for the resource
--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
newS3ResourceClassification :: Text -> ClassificationType -> S3ResourceClassification

-- | The S3 resources whose classification types you want to update. This
--   data type is used as a request parameter in the UpdateS3Resources
--   action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newS3ResourceClassificationUpdate</a> smart
--   constructor.
data S3ResourceClassificationUpdate
S3ResourceClassificationUpdate' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> ClassificationTypeUpdate -> S3ResourceClassificationUpdate

-- | Create a value of <a>S3ResourceClassificationUpdate</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:prefix:S3ResourceClassificationUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassificationUpdate_prefix</a> - The prefix of the S3
--   bucket whose classification types you want to update.
--   
--   <a>$sel:bucketName:S3ResourceClassificationUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassificationUpdate_bucketName</a> - The name of the S3
--   bucket whose classification types you want to update.
--   
--   <a>$sel:classificationTypeUpdate:S3ResourceClassificationUpdate'</a>,
--   <a>s3ResourceClassificationUpdate_classificationTypeUpdate</a> - The
--   classification type that you want to update for the resource
--   associated with Amazon Macie Classic.
newS3ResourceClassificationUpdate :: Text -> ClassificationTypeUpdate -> S3ResourceClassificationUpdate
